How weird, I think I remember you buying a new car in another post a couple=
 of years ago.  What kind is it this time?

Robin


  ----- Original Messag=
e ----- 
  From: Frank Sumption<mailto:franks-boxes@...> 
  To: evp=
-itc@yahoogroups.com<mailto:evp-itc@yahoogroups.com> 
  Sent: Thursday, Jan=
uary 03, 2008 1:43 AM
  Subject: RE: [EVP-ITC]


   Right now it's just lit=
tle trimpot on the board, but can easily be made a panel mount control. 
  =
 
   Geeze 3 in the morning, good thing I bought Olgra a new car this aften=
oon! 
   
   Frank-s





-------------------------------------------------=
---------------------------
    To: evp-itc@yahoogroups.com<mailto:evp-itc@=
yahoogroups.com>
    From: paranormalinvestigating@...<mailto:paran=
ormalinvestigating@...>
    Date: Wed, 2 Jan 2008 12:48:49 -0500
  =
  Subject: RE: [EVP-ITC]


    Frank,
     
    of course I did!
     
    =
I posted a reply this morning.
    It is fantastic no noise and nice and sm=
ooth
    If it has an adjustment knob like all the other boxes it's perfect=
.
     
    Bruce



    Bruce Halliday 


    <http://free-paranormalinves=
tigating.com/%3C/div%3E%3C/div%3E%3Cp%20/%3E%3Cdiv%20class=3D>




--------=

      To=
: evp-itc@yahoogroups.com
      From: franks-boxes@...
      Date: =
Wed, 2 Jan 2008 10:11:55 -0700
      Subject: RE: [EVP-ITC]


       So did=
 anyone get a chance to listen to the one I did the tone control test on? I=
t's an attempt at something like a clarifier control. It's in my folder, un=
der the files section, and the test is more toward the end of the segment. =

       
       Frank-S




-----------------------------------------------=
-------------------------
        To: evp-itc@yahoogroups.com
        From:=
 paranormalinvestigating@...
        Date: Wed, 2 Jan 2008 08:19:59=
 -0500
        Subject: RE: [EVP-ITC]


        Frank,
         
        I =
heard a few words hear and there but for the most part the noise over took =
everything.
         
        Bruce



        Bruce Halliday 


        <h=
ttp://free-paranormalinvestigating.com/%3C/div%3E%3C/div%3E%3Cp%20/%3E%3Cdi=

          To: evp-itc@yahoogroups.com
          From: franks-=
boxes@...
          Date: Wed, 2 Jan 2008 00:13:05 -0700
          =
Subject: [EVP-ITC] 


           These are direct from the system output sp=
eaker, the speaker that will provide the raw audio output for this box. The=
re seems to be more static on the AM band tonight, part of that is cuz I th=
ink this board has more RF gain at the antenna then the previous board. It =
probably depends on the type of core I used for the coil, and since they ar=
e from the junk box, I have no idea what the permeability rating is for the=
se cores. The core being a ferrite bobbin that I wind the coil on. 
       =
    
           Frank-S
